comments: I took PEH 286 during the summer with her and she has a very clear grading criteria. She gives plenty of time to finish assignments. This course was all online, which meant the labs part were excluded which I loved! She\'s a good professor and will answer any questions about any assignment.

comments: I have taken a few courses with this Professor, and she has been nothing but helpful to make sure her students understand the material she is teaching. Erin is overall full of energy in teaching, and invites her students to be interactive with one another and herself. She cares about her students, and goes above and beyond her job description.

comments: She is very determined and she expresses her beliefs. She allowed you to talk in class. A lecture and review. Don\'t have to bring book in class. Overall great!

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: I have no personal attachment with this professor. This professor is clearly under qualified and professionalism is out the door. There is no use in trying to make an argument towards anything you think is unclear or plainly wrong. She expects to always be punctual yet she arrives late to class almost every day. Specializes in DISRESPECT

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: This is not an easy class to begin with, you need to make sure you go over everything in detail. I got an A- in this class which was above the average, but I also put effort into emailing her about things i did not understand. The only flaws I found were the disorganization and sometimes the course material and format of testing could be confusing.

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Ms. Long is a very nice lady but she is very unorganized and an EXTREMELY tough grader. I turned in all my assignments on time and did all the required work with correct answers, but she would never give out an A. The class is hard and requires lots of time and work which you must be willing to do. The average grade in her class was a C.

comments: When I was having a hard time she was helpful. This is not a easy A class you are going to have to put in your share of studying. The course content was good and she did teach us what we needed to know. Those that I see on here that gave a bad review of her must not have done their share.
